name: Notice of hearings and reviews
text: [§346-399]  Notice of hearings and reviews.  Notice of hearings and reviews shall be provided to the parties; provided that no further notice is required for any party who was given actual notice of a hearing or review while present in court.  Notice of hearings or reviews shall be served no less than forty-eight hours before the scheduled hearing, or as otherwise determined by the court. [L 2013, c 252, pt of §2]
